title: Account deletion
content:
Hello,

I am unable to login into my account because I don't have access to my 2FA device and I didn't receive the codes at that time (probably a timeout but I can't say for sure). I am trying to find the support email so that I can ask them to delete the information associated with *that* email address. Every time I try to access some link that resembles contact information, I somehow end up in this support portal. support@firefox.com doesn't seem to work. Any advice?

Thanks

(please don't do offtopic such as: "have you tried searching for backup codes on drive or email?", it was more than 4 years ago).
creator: cristi_feda

title: Firefox is not synching my bookmarks on my new computer
content: I just bought a new computer and signed into my account like normal. Bookmarks won't sync. I've been through about 3 computers over the last year and haven't had any issues till now. I've tried everything I can think of including: reinstall Firefox, sign in and out, reboot, click on sync several times, and nothing. Help! I'm using Windows 11 for the first time. Is that the issue?
creator: mattjd

title: Secure Connection Failed -- How to bypass?
content:
Sometimes when I try to use Google Firefox will slap me with the SECURE CONNECTION FAILED page (attached). Which obviously NO!!! It's GOOGLE. I have to reload and reload and reload and reload and it can take absolutely forever to get it to work properly again. Only happens with Google. How do I either fix this or force Firefox to access non-secure websites anyway? There has to be a way to force access regardless of security!

Thank you!
creator: peterturbo_apologist

title: My window shows up as a different language than my primary language.
content:
I accidentally downloaded Japanese version of Firefox and I've changed to English as the primary language. But for some reason, all of the windows for "open file" "attachments" is in Japanese. I have both languages in my mac but I have my primary language as English. I made sure by going over the settings, removing Japanese, restarting and going back to Firefox to see if it fixed the issue. I also removed Japanese as an alternative language on Firefox as well but nothing seems to fix the problem.

The attachment is what I see every time whenever I open a window in Firefox. No other program has this problem. I can still use the window in Japanese but it bothers me not knowing what is causing this issue.
creator: foreverblue25

title: in my LAST PASS account there is no privacy and anyone can get in.  How do I fix this?
content: HOW DO I MAKE LAST PASS SECURE??
